message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair starting point considering its value to both of us.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I'm looking to get out of this product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900,000 significantly undervalues the product's true worth. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $1,050,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,050,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,020,000, but I think that's the highest I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
